price: Katakanlah, "Malaikat maut yang diserahi untuk (mencabut nyawa)mu akan mematikanmu, kemudian hanya kepada Tuhan-mulah kamu akan dikembalikan.
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ ٱلَّذِي وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul yatawaffākum malaku al-mawti alladhī wukkila bikum thumma ilā rabbikum tur'jaʿūna
